H rail It Radio Corporation
CHICAGO
OFFICE OF
Ted Leitzell
March 31, 1953
Mr, Graydon Ausmus, President
NAEB
Box 2002
University, Alabama
Dear Mr. Ausmus:
Many thanks for your nice letter
of March 27th.
I expect to learn a great deal
from membership in NAEB, and I
hope that I shall be able to make
contributions of value to educaÂ¬
tional broadcasting.
